description.para:

The token for the next page of results.

In order to manually control output pagination, use '-NextToken $null' for the first call and '-NextToken $AWSHistory.LastServiceResponse.NextToken' for subsequent calls.

Use the -Select parameter to control the cmdlet output. The default value is 'ConnectPeers'. Specifying -Select '*' will result in the cmdlet returning the whole service response (Amazon.NetworkManager.Model.ListConnectPeersResponse). Specifying the name of a property of type Amazon.NetworkManager.Model.ListConnectPeersResponse will result in that property being returned. Specifying -Select '^ParameterName' will result in the cmdlet returning the selected cmdlet parameter value.

By default the cmdlet will auto-iterate and retrieve all results to the pipeline by performing multiple service calls. If set, the cmdlet will retrieve only the next 'page' of results using the value of NextToken as the start point.
